data.title: Mexican Burrito Bowl
data.subTitle: Te Be Determined
data.description: Lorem, ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Totam, in temporibus laborum, non est deleniti eum hic, ipsam recusandae dolor impedit? Cumque odit sapiente explicabo minus ea voluptatum eaque illo.

prep: Crush up the dried chipotle chillies.
cook: Heat a frying pan on medium-high heat, and spray with the cooking spray.
Add the mince and break up into smaller chunks.
Once the mince has started to brown (4-5 minutes) add the onion.
Once the onion has softened (6-8 minutes) add the garlic, chillies, tomato purée, stock and kidney beans.
Reduce the heat to low and simmer for 15-20 minutes, until thickened
Meanwhile, cook the 250g dried rice according to packet instructions

ingredients: 400g lean beef mince (5% fat or less)
1 tsp crushed dried chipotle chillies (dried ones are sold whole)
2 x 400g cans red kidney beans in chilli sauce
salt and freshly ground black pepper
